message.entry: When the first input is tall, the 'ProminenceWindow' parameter must be specified.
The 'MaxNumExtrema' parameter is not supported for tall array and tall table inputs.
The 'MinSeparation' parameter is not supported for tall array and tall table inputs.
The 'SamplePoints' parameter is not supported for tall array and tall table inputs.
Tall timetable inputs are not supported.
